page.title: 20HALLOW PARK SCHOOL
page.content: The Wichenford survey was carried out by the girls of{Hallow Park School, which is 2 miles east of the area. Mostly city children at this boarding school, the girls found the landscape and lifestyle fascinating. Collecting facts and meeting the people provided interest and a new community link Girls' reactions were: {Michelle Broad:}very interesting {Debbie Trett:}useful to do {Adele Harvey:}enjoyed the farm {Jackie Foster:}alright sometimes {Corinne Powell:}captivated my interest {Mandy Jackson:}alright sometimes {Jackie Johnson:}Not Bad! {Theresa Pipe:}it was fun {Angela Smith:}a good idea {Kimberley Edgell:}exciting {Melissa}Chitty:interesting to find out {Emma Barnes:}Kenswick Manor, a bonus {Louise Young:}enjoyed the wildlife.
